forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 27F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with a mixture of rain and snow developing overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with periods of light rain and snow later at night. Low near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
